content:
Paper Planes may fly high,
but they'll float lower when you get close,
making them easy to catch.

Yes, Paper Planes can be caught with an insect net too!
If I'm fast enough—
Maybe I can catch both bugs and Paper Planes in one swoop?

Hit the brakes—hit the brakes!
Huh, did I run past the Paper Planes?!
I ran... ran too fast while chasing.

It must be...
They've realized how amazing Bensa is!

I'm hooked on catching Paper Planes!
But... it seems I can only catch a few each day,
What's up with that weird rule?

So, the key to catching Paper Planes
isn't about speed,
but precision... Ah! There's a Paper Plane over there!
